alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 8:59PM AKDT until April 05 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Plan on areas of poor visibilities to create difficult travel conditions at times. Northeast winds gusting to 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast from Kivalina North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds gusting to 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. The worst conditions are from Kivalina north. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas.
